maps.convert.osm2gml

Class TemporaryMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.convert.osm2gml.TemporaryMap

  • public class TemporaryMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all temporary information during map conversion.

      • setNearbyThreshold

        public void setNearbyThreshold(double t)
        Set the threshold for deciding if two points are the same. The isNear(Point2D, Point2D) method uses this value to check if a new point needs to be registered.
        Parameters:
        t - The new threshold.

      • getNearbyThreshold

        public double getNearbyThreshold()
        Get the threshold for deciding if two points are the same. The isNear(Point2D, Point2D) method uses this value to check if a new point needs to be registered.
        Returns:
        The nearby threshold.

      • isNear

        public boolean isNear(Point2D point1,
             Point2D point2)
        Find out if two points are nearby.
        Parameters:
        point1 - The first point.
        point2 - The second point.
        Returns:
        True iff the two points are within the nearby threshold.

      • isNear

        public boolean isNear(double x1,
             double y1,
             double x2,
             double y2)
        Find out if two points are nearby.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x coordinate of the first point.
        y1 - The y coordinate of the first point.
        x2 - The x coordinate of the second point.
        y2 - The y coordinate of the second point.
        Returns:
        True iff the two points are within the nearby threshold.

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(Point2D p)
        Get a Node near a point. If a Node already exists nearby then it will be returned, otherwise a new Node will be created.
        Parameters:
        p - The node coordinates.
        Returns:
        A Node.

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(double x,

        Get a Node near a point. If a Node already exists nearby then it will be returned, otherwise a new Node will be created.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate.
        y - The Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        A Node.

                             Node... splitPoints)
        Split an edge into chunks.
        Parameters:

        splitPoints - The points to split the line. These must be in order along the line.
